Glenn Kerbiriou

Computer Graphics Ph.D. Student at INSA and InterDigital R&I.

website : glennkerbiriou.yj.fr

Experience

December 2020 - March 2021 Virtual Reality engineer at INSA and INRIA, Rennes

March 2020 - September 2021 Internship at InterDigital R&I, Rennes. Research on automatic 3D facial caricature generation.

October 2019 - February 2020 Industrial Project at ESIR with Corona, Rennes. Implementation of Optimal Multiple Importance Sampling (OptiMIS) for bidirectional light transport simulation.

June 2019 - September 2019 Internship at ONHYS, Sophia Antipolis. Implementation of crowd rendering and other rendering features in ONHYS One crowd simulation software.

June 2018 - September 2018 Internship at INRIA and LOUSIC, Rennes. Cybersecurity subject : Graphical User Authentification.

June 2016 Internship at Technicolor R&D, Rennes. Virtual Reality subject : Reflection handling in VR.
